result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

ADDRESS INFO for Joseph I. Torres  PROVIDED BY DEFENDANT VIA PURPLE FORM

Defendant Joseph I. Torres in court with attorney Rachel Marie Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. On motion of the State, case dismissed and readin.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 9, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joseph I. Torres in court with attorney Rachel Marie Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Patti L. Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Alme Boaz requests a plea/sentencing date in December. Parties have agreed to a resolution. Court removes 12/2/2014 trial date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 9, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Further proceedings on November 12, 2014 at 03:00 pm.
Case rescheduled to 3:00 pm on 11/12/2014 to allow time for a possible plea/sentencing.
Further proceedings on November 12, 2014 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Joseph I. Torres in court with attorney Rachel Marie Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Patti L. Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant informed of charges. Atty. Alme-Boaz requests an offer from the State on all the defendant's cases. Court schedules trial date on 12/2/2014  on 14CF124 and further proceedings 11/12/2014 on both cases.  Further proceedings scheduled for November 12, 2014 at 08:45 am.
Further proceedings on September 10, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Joseph I. Torres in court with attorney Rachel Marie Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Court examines defendant, accepts waiver and binds case over for trial. State files information. Defense waives reading and enters not guilty plea.  Further proceedings scheduled for September 10, 2014 at 10:00 am.
w/condition:    No controlled substances or prescription medication unless prescribed by physician and in conformity with said prescription.
Status hearing on August 4, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Joseph I. Torres in court with attorney Rachel M Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Adam Y Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense waives reading of complaint. Case set for status on preliminary hearing. Defendant waives time limits. Court orders $500 cash w/condition.  Status hearing scheduled for August 4, 2014 at 10:00 am.
